name: untitled
description: for HEN100 i produced 'not 3d', taken from studio material generated in 2019 . using the number of editions sold (8) i have made this follow up as promised, using the formula 100/8=12.5 . this then is an edition of 8 @ 12.5 xtz . i've again used materials that were created as background elements for a solo exhibit in 2019 titled 'failure to communicate' . i had originally planned to produce a pornagraphic wallpaper, using objects to censor the more graphic detail . those objects were: a smiley, a 'love hearts' sweet, and a 'synthetic' ice cream as seen here . in the end i decided not to use the wallpaper, but have numerous times wanted to use the material . this has been one of those instances where i find myself returning to an image repeatedly, unable to decide upon a final use . this objkt marks that final use, an ode to censorship | Brendan Conrad Forde | 'untitled' 2021 | @acid_very
